text: Most participants affirmed that the Singaporean population and healthcare professionals bestow trust in government programs and policies . The next quote highlights that whether participants agreed or not with the proposed policy , there was a sense that the government is " trying to do a good thing " : " When the Singaporean government gets into doing something , they tend to do it very thoroughly . ( . . . ) You may not always agree with the strategy , but you have to give them full marks for trying . " - I04 , Human Health
